General Description
Our Hilton Garden Inn Asheville Downtown hotel is within walking distance to Pack Square and some of the best restaurants and bars in Asheville. Step into our lobby full of natural light and stop by our Iron Hen CafÃ© for seasonal foods and coffee.From the brick and glass exterior to the scenic rooftop bar, pressed tin ceiling tiles in the lobby and the rustic vintage design, our property showcases the uniqueness of Asheville. Explore the amenities offered including a modern fitness center, heated outdoor pool and 24-hour business center. Our pet-friendly hotel and exceptional service will help you feel right at home.Find yourself touring Biltmore Estate, catching an event at Thomas Wolfe Auditorium or driving on the scenic Blueridge Parkway, all just minutes from our hotel.
